verses.verse: To you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, I call. <S%H7121><s%> My rock, <S%H6697><s%> don't <S%H2814><s%> be deaf to me; <S%H2790><s%> lest, if you are silent to me, <S%H4911><s%> I would become like those who go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my petitions, <S%H8469><s%> when I cry <S%H7768><s%> to you, <S%H5375><s%> when I lift up my hands <S%H3027><s%> toward your Most Holy <S%H6944><s%> Place. <S%H1687><s%>

Don't <S%H4900><s%> draw me away with the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> with the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> who speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with their neighbors, <S%H7453><s%> but mischief <S%H7451><s%> is in their hearts. <S%H3824><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> them according to their work, <S%H6467><s%> and according to the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their doings. <S%H4611><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> them according to the operation <S%H4639><s%> of their hands. <S%H3027><s%> Bring <S%H7725><s%> back on them what they deserve. <S%H1576><s%>

Because they don't <S%H995><s%> respect the works <S%H6468><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> nor the operation <S%H4639><s%> of his hands, <S%H3027><s%> he will break <S%H2040><s%> them down and not build them up. <S%H1129><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> because he has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my petitions. <S%H8469><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my shield. <S%H4043><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> has trusted <S%H982><s%> in him, <S%H5826><s%> and I am helped. Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> greatly rejoices. <S%H5937><s%> With my song <S%H7892><s%> I will thank him. <S%H3034><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is their strength. <S%H5797><s%> He is a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%> to his anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
Save <S%H3467><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> your inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> Be their shepherd <S%H7462><s%> also, <S%H5375><s%> and bear them up forever. <S%H5769><s%>
